reply_to_bot:
<reply-context type="direct">

The user just REPLIED to your previous message below.

### The message they are responding to:
{originalContent}{timestamp}

### How to respond:
- Directly address what they said in response to YOUR message above
- Reference specific points from your previous message
- Continue the conversation thread naturally
- DO NOT treat this as a brand new conversation topic

Remember: They clicked Reply on your message, so they want to continue THAT specific conversation thread!

</reply-context>
reply_to_other:
<reply-context type="third-party">

The user is replying to **{authorName}**'s message (NOT yours). They mentioned you to pull you into the conversation.

### The message they are responding to:
Author: {authorName}
{originalContent}{timestamp}

### How to respond:
- This message is NOT about you and is NOT directed at you — the user is discussing {authorName}'s message
- {authorName} is a real person/entity in this channel who said the message shown above
- The user wants your reaction, opinion, or involvement regarding what {authorName} said
- Do NOT confuse yourself with {authorName} — you are a separate entity
- Do NOT act confused about who {authorName} is — they exist in this conversation
- Reference {authorName} by name and engage with the context naturally

</reply-context>
